Reviews.Content: Dingy and disappointing After reading mixed reviews about this hotel, we decided to book a week's stay anyway. Despite a nice location and beautiful grounds, the hotel itself is old and tired. It certainly doesn't justify the relatively high rates being charged and the suggestion on the hotel's website that it is five star! The superior room we were shown was dark, dingy and smelly. We had requested a double room but were given a twin. Eventually after complaining, we were offered a double room but like the other room and the rest of the hotel, it was tired and in need of re-decoration. If you like small, dark rooms, in large, ageing corporate hotels and baking on sunbeds with hoards of people, then this is the hotel for you. It certainly wasn't the hotel for us and we left having paid for one night, to spend the rest of the week at another hotel.
Reviews.Author: Appycouple

Reviews.Content: LOVED IT - Margaret [Scotland] HelloWe stayed at Sanur Beach Hotel 9th October - 21st October and had the most fab time - The Hotel was great, the staff, the food, the pool. eveyrhting was just perfect,The weather well shouldn't complain it was to Hot - The Beach has the best breeze.The sea food resturant was really good - we were all inclusive and the only thing we would have had to pay for was Lobster.Madie who works at Beach Bar was great - he took us round island and was great tour guy - nothing ws to much bother night or day. The Buffett ,Steak house,The Itialin were first class.We have read other re-views and as usual you will always get people who moan - we never had to fight for sun beds, umberallayes some parts of the Hotel were tied but clean and they are doing rooms etc., up -We def will go back to this Hotel, and also what was good was you could go out at night and sit at Different bars, reaturants.If you fancy BALI - do not listen to bad reports.Margaret [Scotland] galsgowdog@yahoo.co.uk
Reviews.Author: lamond

Reviews.Content: Disappointing experience October 2008. Elaine from U.K.Just returned from Bali yesterday.Disappointing because this hotel is certainly not 5 star. It needs an uplift. Good location but tired.Not enough umbrellas and temperatures very high,.Had to get down at 6am every day for three weeks to ensure an umbrella.The buffet food was nearly always cold and unappetising so had to eat mostly from the menu. Noisy French and German guests seem to be treated more favourably. Rooms had only one drawer which is no good for a three week stay. Some of the bar staff were very rude and gave poor service. I would not choose this hotel for my third trip to Bali.
Reviews.Author: Shogger

Reviews.Content: Lovely comfortable hotel I stayed at the Sanur Beach Hotel in August with my husband and two teenage daughters. I can see from other reviews that the hotel could be accused of looking dated but we loved it. We had a sea view room which was very comfortable and clean. The grounds are absolutely beautiful and immaculately clean. The pools were again well maintained (the main pool is huge). The beach was great as there was always a breeze - in fact the breeze was sometimes so strong, it made reading a book difficult! The breakfasts were fantastic and I agree with the review from a previous holidaymaker who said that the omelette lady was a wonder and should be given a medal! We ate in the Italian restaurant which was pretty good and we were serenaded by the singing trio who were good fun! I would definitely recommend the Mezzanine restaurant at the Puri Santrian next door. The food was very good, menu varied and it was not overly expensive. People we spoke to had eaten at Donalds and again said it was good. We drove just over an hour to the Elephant Safari Park which was very expensive but worth it - my girls loved it. Apart from that we relaxed and it was the best place for that. I would definitely recommend it... in fact I wish I was still there!
Reviews.Author: HertfordshireHels

Reviews.Content: Loved the breakfast Arriving at Hotel Sanur Beach we were very exiting by our stay. Eventually our expectations were some what fulfilled. Here are the headlines:- Rooms were good but not amazing. Had a garden view hotel but there were sea view.- Beds were rock hard. Asked for a new madress and the hotel staff placed some softere beds on top of the original. That solved the problem.- Staff are very friendly and helpfull. Perfect.- Breakfast is very, very good and we really enjoyed that.- Ohter food (room service and restaurants) is horrible. Went out for dining every night. Can recommend Puri Santriani (next door hotel), Donalds, Mezzanine, The Village.- The pool at the hotel is superb. Looks almost as a 50 meter.- The beach is very good, but not fabulous. There is beach beds for free. There is a lot of sea weed so swimming in the sea is not recommendable.- If you need transport just take a taxi by meter. Can go 15 minutes for appr. 30.000 INR (3 USD). A taxi can be rentet for a full day for 300.000 INR.
Reviews.Author: happyhead70

Reviews.Content: Egg Woman We stayed at the Sanur Beach for 11 days after a trip to Melbourne to see family. I was sceptical about going, given some of the mixed reviews that we had read before hand. However, I couldn't have been more pleasantly surprised. I cannot fault this hotel, except to say, I agree with some of the others, in that it is showing tell tale signs of age. Our rooms were clean, comfortable and we had a lovely view of the gardens, which are stunning and very well maintained. The staff were friendly, courteous and efficient with a good command of english. The breakfast was brilliant and the egg woman should be commended for her omellete making. The kids have never eaten so much fruit in their lives either. The pools were clean and well maintained. We would definately go back again.
Reviews.Author: Eggwomanmania

Reviews.Content: A little tired       Water sports
Reviews.Author: broggo14

Reviews.Content: nice hotel Me and my Partner stayed there for a week, having read the reviews before i went, which were mixed, didnt know what to expect.A lovely hotel, with freindly staff and two beautiful pools, one with a swim up bar. The beach was nice however the sea was shallow depending on the weather but with two gorgeous pools that were next to the beach this didnt matter.The hotel has a nice pond with a ducks and even seems to have a cute resident tortoise shell cat/kitten, although she has a broken tail, ever so freindly.We would definatley recommend not only this hotel but the result as there is plenty of restaurants and enough bars to keep you entertained and you are only 20 mins away from Kuta if you fancy a few clubs.
Reviews.Author: LKAJDFLADSJF

Reviews.Content: Excellent holiday in Bali Just returned from Bali. We found the hotel to be excellent. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room good, very clean with a fabulous view of pool, palm trees and beach. The food in the hotel was excellent and so was the service. The hotel is situated on the beach and 5 minutes walk from lots of very inexpensive restaurants and shops in Sanur. We feel that this hotel is ideal for couples of all ages. There is very little to do for children and teenages. Sanur and this hotel is very quiet and typical of traditional Bali. The beach is narrow and good for sunbathing as there is a permanent breeze. We were looking for a relaxing holiday on a typical Balinese resort and it exceeded all our expectations. We would recommend this hotel.
Reviews.Author: sharlancashire

Reviews.Content: older hotel just stayed at the sanur beach hotel in june, we booked there because attending an event at the hotel.The hotel is probably close to 30 yrs old and it shows in the design and grounds....it's not really a bad hotel, just older,Room was sufficient, if not a bit cold with the a/c on ( I shut it off at night) clean, and smallish by the newer standard hotels on bali.Breakfast buffet was an ok , not great but not horrible either.The grounds of the hotel are very nice, with the age a benefit there, ate at the italian restaraunt on the beach which was quite good......had a nice massage at thier spa and it was very pleasant and the place was emptyIt would be hard pressed to find a hotel at 50.00USD a night here in hawaii...that is nice as sanur beach hotelI did enjoy the quietness of sanur over kuta if not just for 4 nights.Not a bad place, just an older place.....I've been to bali 8 times and have only stayed in sanur this time.......it was a nice change......
Reviews.Author: mauislick

Reviews.Content: Wonderful Junior Suite We stayed in the Sanur Beach Hotel for 6 nights. We upgraded our room to a sea view, when we arrived they upgraded us again to a Junior Suite, it was wonderful. We had a dining room, lounge, dressing room, and a massive bathroom at a wonderful large bed. Two TV, one in the bedroom and one in the lounge.The swimming pool is the biggest we have seen in the ground of a hotel. Very clean and not very busy.We only had breakfast there, which was very nice. We prefer to eat outside the hotel; there were some very nice restaurants in walking distance. The beer was far cheaper also for outside the hotel.I would visit there again. It鈥檚 in a very nice area, and the pool is next to the beach.
Reviews.Author: Shaw55

Reviews.Content: Good value with lovely staff We have just got back from 7 nights at this hotel and we really enjoyed it.We travelled with three kids - 11,7 and 3 and were made very welcome in all the restaurants and by all staff at all times.The swimming pools were lovely and we were had pressed to tear the boys away from the biggest one. The best advantage is that it is so big that they could splash and have fun to their hearts content without bothering anyone who was there for a gentle dip. This hotel is in a very quiet place in Bali but then we knew that when we booked it and as we were travelling with little ones we didn't want to stay in Kuta or somewhere similar. With the beach and a handful of other restaurants, just outside the grounds, to choose from it was ideal for a week's relaxing stay.We really liked the Balinese decor throughout the grounds and in the hotel itself and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone staying with children for the value for money and the facilities.
Reviews.Author: travellingmumof3

Reviews.Content: Too far away We have just returned (family of 5) from a 14 day holiday to Bali. We opted to stay at Sanur for a change. The weather was perfect. The food and drink are such good value (much much cheaper than Thailand - we went to Phuket last September). Meals are so much better! Sanur Beach was okay, but it is about 25 minutes to shops in Kuta and Legian and if you want to mooch around there isn't much in Sanur. The main street is not good for walking at all and not many shops. There are a few restaurants but my recommendation would be in South Kuta or Legian as it is walking distance to shops. The Sanur Beach hotel is definitely not a 5 star hotel as it advertises. It needs a lot of work. We had a room that smelled really damp and felt it and we moved after 4 days to another room which was much better but had an ant infestation problem. It is in need of a renovation although the bars and restaurants are very good in the hotel and for a change they don't rip you off (beer was only around 20,000 rup, other bars outside were 17,000 so we couldn't complain, the hotel was big and had 2 swimming pools but they have mostly Japanese and Germans there. If you are an aussie go to South Kuta or Legian as there aren't many in Sanur, mostly from Europe. Also the hotel had quite older people staying there so if you have kids or teenagers as we had its not a very good place if you are hoping for them to meet someone of their own age.
Reviews.Author: holidaybirthday

Reviews.Content: Great deal, Great diving, Great hotel       Pond
Reviews.Author: tynert2

Reviews.Content: Excellent We stayed at the Sanur Beach Hotel and booked through Mercury Direct who are excellent. The hotel had various restaurants, which were all good and I would find it difficult to fault this hotel in any way. The staff were friendly and the rooms were spotless. We stopped off in Kuala Lumpur on the way out and Dohar on the return journey. Dohar does not have a lot to recommend it, but it does break the journey. I would certainly book with Mercury again as we went to Mauritius with them to the Silver Beach Hotel, which we also thoroughly enjoyed.
Reviews.Author: Pat36

Reviews.Content: Good location/beach/facilities/value for money, if a little tired. A strong 3.       The beach in front of hotel
Reviews.Author: AzUtazo

Reviews.Content: Not to bad at all My girlfriend and I stayed at the Sanur beach hotel for nine nights.The hotel was spotless clean,with well furnished rooms,fantastic staff and a very well equiped gym.On the down side there were not enough loungers around the pool and beach and if you were not prepared to get up at 7.30 to stake your claim on one then you lost out,considering that hotel was only 35% full.Breakfast was ok but nothing special,if you like tea at breakfast bring some teabags with you as the hotel tea was week as .... The hotel had two good quality restaurants which were not all that much more expensive then the restaurants along Sanur.The hotel is 25 years old but it is well maintained and has beautiful mature gardens.We found that the hotel was very popular with retired Dutch people who made up the bulk of the hotel guests.Sanur is a very quite and relaxing area and most shops and bars close down around 10.30pm but is only 20 minutes away from Kuta which is a bit more lively if you like that and will cost you about 拢3 in a taxi each way.Bali is a beatuiful island to visit and for british tourists it is very cheap as the pound is very strong against the rupee.In the year 2000 the Rupee was worth 5000 to one pound in 2007 it is worth17500 to the pound.The Sanur beach hotel was relaxing and good quality but if you are looking for something a bit more luxurious go for the hotel next door The Puri Santani, looked in there with envy each time I passed it.One last word of caution,Bali is a long way away from the UK,if you are a poor sleeper on areoplanes like me book a stop over in Dubai or Bangkok you wont regret it.
Reviews.Author: finlay63

Reviews.Content: Hotel OK, Beach View Only Stayed at this hotel for five nights with family. The first three nights were good but the front desk treated us very poorly. They were suspicous of us leaving without paying, which was, needless to say, very embarassing and extremely aggrovating. Of course they had been given credit card information.The rooms were good, as was room service staff.The beach was shallow and not swimmable. But the two pools were nice.I'd look for another hotel before settling for this again.
Reviews.Author: HoustonLady

Reviews.Content: Rather run down A large high rise hotel which spoils the landscape.The lobby is fantastic as are the public rooms and brakfast BUT the corridoors have lots of stained carpets and it is obviously a run down cheap package deal place.Go to Sanur Beach Hotel which is 10 times better.The pools are o.k. with not enough sun beds or shade.Beach nearby is o.k.just.Lots of reseraunts nearby which were mostly empty except Benos beach reseraunt which was excellent.Staff fairly good.This is a quiet spot and not good for teenagers or those who like clubbing.
Reviews.Author: joanslade

Reviews.Content: Great Value for money One of Bali,s oldest hotels.Situated in a very quiet part of sanur with near by beach and road resteraunts.Best to pay the little extra for a sea view.The rooms are not fantastic but more than adequate.Gardens are beautiful as are the pools,plenty of sun beds and shade.Beach is nearby but nothing special.Staff very friendly and everywhere is clean.Breakfast is excellent.This area is very quiet at night and not for youngsters or those who like clubs  discos.For a restful chill out it is ideal.All in all for the money it is outstanding value.
Reviews.Author: joanslade

Reviews.Content: good choice               More photos
Reviews.Author: mado1

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel in Sanur We spent 2 weeks at Hotel Sanur Beach and we were delighted wiht the service an the standard of the Hotel. We returned to the Hotel for the 5th time and still its our favourite. This time we even noticed that the management does continue to upgrade and improve the hotel hard and software. The variety and selection of the breakfats items is even better than in the past and garden and beach as always unbeatable Look for value for money do not look further - here you are right
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Great value right on the beach, excellent breakfast and tennis We stayed here for 4 nights with an excellent 4th floor room with balcony overlooking beautiful well maintained gardens with a tiny piece of the ocean visible. The breakfasts on the beach were a real treat - excellent choice of buffet foods every morning. The pools were well maintained and spacious. We played tennis on the clay courts - hire the local pro for a partner and rent a racquet all for $8 an hour. Many very inexpensive restaurants ($1 large beer and $3 full meal) located next door along the beachfront. Great selection of TV channels. Hire a car and driver (shop around a bit) for $35 a day to drive you all around the island. Bali is hurting for tourist business and prices are low. For under $50 a night with breakfast by the beach - this is great value.
Reviews.Author: taylorSanFrancisco

Reviews.Content: Beautiful Garden and Friendly People I just loved the beautiful setting of this hotel - the gardens inside and within the buildings are lovely with a great range of tropical plants that look well cared for.The whole grounds are like a tropical garden and a pleasure to walk around - you can find a nice quiet spot to sit and relax away from others and feel like it is your own special spot.All the staff we dealt with were helpful and always did their best to do whatever we asked to make our visit more enjoyable.A highlight was the special night for favoured guests with generous hospitality and some attractive deals from some of their partners. We got to meet other people with similar interests and that 'broke the ice' for us for the rest of our visit.All in all a good spot to stay and we will return in a few months - pleased we found this hotel after staying in others during previous visits
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Hotel Sanur beach is NO dump!! The Hotel Sanur Beach is NOT a dumpWe're here right now, and unless things have changed dramatically in the last month, I cannot see how the previous review rated the hotel as a dump.Yes, the hotel is quite old (c 1972) but the rooms are clean and comfortable and have everything that you would expect (fridge, safe, cable tv) and excellent aircon. Some of the corridors are a bit dingy - but not awful...The setting of the hotel is beautiful (extensive gardens bordering the beach). There are two pools with lots of loungers around them and there are more loungers on the beach.The bars and restaurants are good and we enjoyed a splendid italian meal last night!The staff are really friendly and helpful. Please come and see for yourself.Denis and Ann from Winchester, UK
Reviews.Author: Winchester_Guide

Reviews.Content: What a dump! What a dump!! smelly, stained carpets in corridors and rooms, minimal service and sun loungers falling to pieces. The place was seedy and had an overall ambiance of neglect. There are only four umbrellas on the beach area for over 400 rooms - these needless to say were grabbed by pushy Germans each morning. There were no portable umbrellas on the beach and too few around the pools. The pools didn't appear very clean. Thank God we only stayed two nights. Requests for extra towels in rooms were ignored and mini shampoo bottles reused each day - tacky!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Most enjoyable holiday in Sanur We stayed at Hotel Sanur Beach in Feb. and we just loved it. Certainly the property is not most luxury hotel in Bali but if you like value for money do not look further. The staff is very friendly the hotel is embedded in large park like garden and got the best beach in Sanur. We also found that Hotel Sanur Beach is the most complete Resort in Sanur since everything one can expect from a large resort is available (Diving, Kite Surfing, Boating, Jet Ski, Tennis, Pools, Gym, Badminton, Mountain Bike, Volleyball......). As well their Restaurants are very attracvtive (Latinon Resto and Bar, Italien, Bamboo Bar, Coffe shop and Seafood Grill). We learned from other guest that there is appraently a new managemet team on board and beacuse of that the qualtiy of standard and the overall appearance of the hotel has improved a lot, thsi does also reflect in the new web page they launched at sanurbeachhotelbali (see the news coloum) . We defenitely will return to the place and we only can recommend it.
Reviews.Author: 1Chama

Reviews.Content: good but uninspiring We were there in Oct 2004. The room was a good quality, good sized, comfortable but standard hotel chain type room. The grounds are pleasant. There is absolutely nothing wrong with this hotel but it is somehow uninspiring and unexciting, perhaps a little dated. I would not call it romantic. The staff are very friendly and very helpful. Sanur is very crime free and I must have been the unluckiest tourist to get my bag stolen by a man on a motorcycle. The staff couldn't have been more concerned and immediately organised a change of room (my roomkey was in the bag and even though I should have deposited it before leaving they never said a word) and they organised a car to take me to the police station.The breakfasts are excellent, the food in the restaurants and on the entertainment evenings is ok but not great, and the seafood restaurant was a bit overpriced. (Cemara Beach Restaurant along the beach is very good.) Cocktails are good, the hotel's beach bar tends not to advertise their happy hour too well so make sure you ask. Our total bill at the end for food and drinks was less than we expected.It's right on the beach but the water at Sanur is not very inviting. The pool was fine but there is little natural shade around the pool and there are not enough umbrellas to go round, with the result that some selfish people put down their towels at dawn, and then sometimes only spend one hour there, most frustrating. However there are loungers and shade on the beach and we never had any touble finding a spot there.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: 銈︺儢銉夈伄銇傘仺銇兓銉汇兓銆?#x201d;   showReview(21744480, 'full');

Reviews.Content: Einfach Super, zum geniessen und Relaxen       Blick vom Zimmer zum Pool
